text: @senatemajldr "...conflicts of interest from Trump’s ownership of a hotel a block down Pennsylvania Avenue...officials at his company raised concerns about a competing hotel possibly being built in place of the Hoover Building should the FBI relocate to the suburbs." https://t.co/8UbkNOHQNs
